title: CSG Files Patent for Wild-Looking eBike Wheel with Batteries In the Rim
content:
A recent patent from Cycling Sports Group details a new “Bicycle Power System” wherein a string of battery cells are located inside the circumference of…

The post CSG Files Patent for Wild-Looking eBike Wheel with Batteries In the Rim appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Jessie-May Morgan
